data.name: support.convinced.title
data.value: I'm convinced! {0}

data.name: support.convinced.support
data.value: support osu!

data.name: support.convinced.gift
data.value: or gift supporter to other players

data.name: support.convinced.instructions
data.value: click the heart button to proceed to the osu!store

data.name: support.why-support.title
data.value: Why should I support osu!? Where does the money go?

data.name: support.why-support.team.title
data.value: Support the Team

data.name: support.why-support.team.description
data.value: A small team develops and runs osu!. Your support helps them to, you know... live.

data.name: support.why-support.infra.title
data.value: Server Infrastructure

data.name: support.why-support.infra.description
data.value: Contributions go towards the servers for running the website, multiplayer services, online leaderboards, etc.

data.name: support.why-support.featured-artists.title
data.value: Featured Artists

data.name: support.why-support.featured-artists.description
data.value: With your support, we can approach even more awesome artists and license more great music for use in osu!

data.name: support.why-support.featured-artists.link_text
data.value: View the current roster »

data.name: support.why-support.ads.title
data.value: Keep osu! self-sustaining

data.name: support.why-support.ads.description
data.value: Your contributions help keep the game independent and completely free from ads and outside sponsors.

data.name: support.why-support.tournaments.title
data.value: Official Tournaments

data.name: support.why-support.tournaments.description
data.value: Help fund the running of (and the prizes for) the official osu! World Cup tournaments.

data.name: support.why-support.tournaments.link_text
data.value: Explore tournaments »

data.name: support.why-support.bounty-program.title
data.value: Open Source Bounty Program

data.name: support.why-support.bounty-program.description
data.value: Support the community contributors that have given their time and effort to help make osu! better.

data.name: support.why-support.bounty-program.link_text
data.value: Find out more »

data.name: support.perks.title
data.value: Cool! What perks do I get?

data.name: support.perks.osu_direct.title
data.value: osu!direct

data.name: support.perks.osu_direct.description
data.value: Gain quick and easy access to search for and download beatmaps without having to leave the game.

data.name: support.perks.friend_ranking.title
data.value: Friend Ranking

data.name: support.perks.friend_ranking.description
data.value: See how you stack up against your friends on a beatmap's leaderboard, both in-game and on the website.

data.name: support.perks.country_ranking.title
data.value: Country Ranking

data.name: support.perks.country_ranking.description
data.value: Conquer your country before you conquer the world.

data.name: support.perks.mod_filtering.title
data.value: Filter by Mods

data.name: support.perks.mod_filtering.description
data.value: Associate only with people who play HDHR? No problem!

data.name: support.perks.auto_downloads.title
data.value: Automatic Downloads

data.name: support.perks.auto_downloads.description
data.value: Beatmaps will automatically download in multiplayer games, while spectating others, or when clicking relevant links in chat!

data.name: support.perks.upload_more.title
data.value: Upload More

data.name: support.perks.upload_more.description
data.value: Additional pending beatmap slots (per ranked beatmap) up to a max of 10.

data.name: support.perks.early_access.title
data.value: Early Access

data.name: support.perks.early_access.description
data.value:
Gain early access to new releases with new features before they go public!

This includes early access to new features on the website too!

data.name: support.perks.customisation.title
data.value: Customisation

data.name: support.perks.customisation.description
data.value: Stand out by uploading a custom cover image or by creating a fully customizable 'me!' section within your user profile.

data.name: support.perks.beatmap_filters.title
data.value: Beatmap Filters

data.name: support.perks.beatmap_filters.description
data.value: Filter beatmap searches by played and unplayed maps, or by rank achieved.

data.name: support.perks.yellow_fellow.title
data.value: Yellow Fellow

data.name: support.perks.yellow_fellow.description
data.value: Be recognised in-game with your new bright yellow chat username colour.

data.name: support.perks.speedy_downloads.title
data.value: Speedy Downloads

data.name: support.perks.speedy_downloads.description
data.value: More lenient download restrictions, especially when using osu!direct.

data.name: support.perks.change_username.title
data.value: Change Username

data.name: support.perks.change_username.description
data.value: One free name change is included with your first supporter purchase.

data.name: support.perks.skinnables.title
data.value: Skinnables

data.name: support.perks.skinnables.description
data.value: Extra in-game skinnables, like the main menu background.

data.name: support.perks.feature_votes.title
data.value: Feature Votes

data.name: support.perks.feature_votes.description
data.value: Votes for feature requests. (2 per month)

data.name: support.perks.sort_options.title
data.value: Sort Options

data.name: support.perks.sort_options.description
data.value: The ability to view beatmap country / friend / mod-specific rankings in-game.

data.name: support.perks.more_favourites.title
data.value: More Favourites

data.name: support.perks.more_favourites.description
data.value: The maximum number of beatmaps you can favourite is increased from {0} → {1}

data.name: support.perks.more_friends.title
data.value: More Friends

data.name: support.perks.more_friends.description
data.value: The maximum number of friends you can have is increased from {0} → {1}

data.name: support.perks.more_beatmaps.title
data.value: Upload More Beatmaps

data.name: support.perks.more_beatmaps.description
data.value:
How many pending beatmaps you can have at once is calculated from a base value plus an additional bonus for each ranked beatmap you currently have (up to a limit).

Normally this is {0} plus {1} per ranked beatmap (up to {2}). With supporter, this increases to {3} plus {4} per ranked beatmap (up to {5}).

data.name: support.perks.friend_filtering.title
data.value: Friend Leaderboards

data.name: support.perks.friend_filtering.description
data.value: Compete with your friends and see how you rank up against them!

data.name: support.supporter_status.contribution
data.value: Thanks for your support so far! You have contributed {0} over {1} tag purchases!

data.name: support.supporter_status.gifted
data.value: You have given away {0} of your purchases as gifts (that's {1} worth), how generous!

data.name: support.supporter_status.not_yet
data.value: You haven't ever had an osu!supporter tag :(

data.name: support.supporter_status.valid_until
data.value: Your current osu!supporter tag is valid until {0}!

data.name: support.supporter_status.was_valid_until
data.value: Your osu!supporter tag was valid until {0}.
